Fault.name: BPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Make sure that value "ns1:ProcessRequestMessage" is resolvable (check imports, value of "messageType").
Fault.msg: "messageType" is set to "ns1:ProcessRequestMessage" on this <bpel:variable> but it cannot be resolved (check value of "messageType", imports, WSDLs or XSDs).

Fault.name: BPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Make sure that value "ns1:ProcessResponseMessage" is resolvable (check imports, value of "messageType").
Fault.msg: "messageType" is set to "ns1:ProcessResponseMessage" on this <bpel:variable> but it cannot be resolved (check value of "messageType", imports, WSDLs or XSDs).

Fault.name: BPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Check the bpel:variable specified on this activity via attribute "outputVariable" and make sure it is itself specified correctly.
Fault.msg: The activity <bpel:invoke> refers to a bpel:variable (via the attribute "outputVariable") - this bpel:variable needs to be defined correctly.

Fault.name: BPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Check the bpel:variable specified on this activity via attribute "inputVariable" and make sure it is itself specified correctly.
Fault.msg: The activity <bpel:invoke> refers to a bpel:variable (via the attribute "inputVariable") - this bpel:variable needs to be defined correctly.

Fault.name: BPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Make sure that value "ns1:Process" is resolvable (check imports, value of "portType").
Fault.msg: "portType" is set to "ns1:Process" on this <bpel:invoke> activity but it cannot be resolved (check value of "portType", imports, WSDLs or XSDs).

Fault.name: BPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Check value of operation ("process") and portType "ns6:execute_ptt".
Fault.msg: No "wsdl:input" message exist on portType "ns6:execute_ptt" with operation "process".
